edu.mines.jtk.sgl

Class SimpleFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • edu.mines.jtk.sgl.SimpleFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class SimpleFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    A simple frame for 3D graphics.
    Version:
    2010.12.09
    Author:
    Chris Engelsma and Dave Hale, Colorado School of Mines.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleFrame

        public SimpleFrame()
        Constructs a simple frame with default parameters. Axes orientation defaults to x-right, y-top and z-down.

      • SimpleFrame

        public SimpleFrame(AxesOrientation ao)
        Constructs a simple frame with specified axes orientation.
        Parameters:
        ao - the axes orientation.

      • SimpleFrame

        public SimpleFrame(World world)
        Constructs a simple frame with the specified world.
        Parameters:
        world - the world view.

      • SimpleFrame

        public SimpleFrame(World world,
           AxesOrientation ao)
        Constructs a simple frame with the specified world and orientation.
        Parameters:
        world - the world view.
        ao - the axes orientation.

      • asTriangles

        public static SimpleFrame asTriangles(float[] xyz)
        Returns a new simple frame with a triangle group. Triangles will be constructed as vertex normals.
        Parameters:
        xyz - array of packed vertex coordinates.
        Returns:
        a simple frame.

      • asTriangles

        public static SimpleFrame asTriangles(boolean vn,
                      float[] xyz)
        Returns a new simple frame with a triangle group.
        Parameters:
        vn - true, for vertex normals; false, for triangle normals.
        xyz - array of packed vertex coordinates.
        Returns:
        the simple frame.

      • asTriangles

        public static SimpleFrame asTriangles(float[] xyz,
                      float[] rgb)
        Returns a new simple frame with a triangle group. Triangles will be constructed as vertex normals.
        Parameters:
        xyz - array of packed vertex coordinates.
        rgb - array of packed color coordinates.
        Returns:
        the simple frame.

      • asTriangles

        public SimpleFrame asTriangles(boolean vn,
                      Sampling sx,
                      Sampling sy,
                      float[][] z)
        Returns a new simple frame with a triangle group.
        Parameters:
        vn - true, for vertex normals; false, for triangle normals.
        sx - sampling of x coordinates; may be non-uniform.
        sy - sampling of y coordinates; may be non-uniform.
        z - array[nx][ny] of z coordinates z = f(x,y).

      • asTriangles

        public SimpleFrame asTriangles(boolean vn,
                      Sampling sx,
                      Sampling sy,
                      float[][] z,
                      float[][] r,
                      float[][] g,
                      float[][] b)
        Returns a new simple frame with a triangle group.
        Parameters:
        vn - true, for vertex normals; false, for triangle normals.
        sx - sampling of x coordinates; may be non-uniform.
        sy - sampling of y coordinates; may be non-uniform.
        z - array[nx][ny] of z coordinates z = f(x,y).
        r - array[nx][ny] of red color components.
        g - array[nx][ny] of green color components.
        b - array[nx][ny] of blue color components.

      • asTriangles

        public static SimpleFrame asTriangles(boolean vn,
                      float[] xyz,
                      float[] rgb)
        Returns a new simple frame with a triangle group.
        Parameters:
        vn - true, for vertex normals; false, for triangle normals
        xyz - array of packed vertex coordinates.
        rgb - array of packed color coordinates.
        Returns:
        the simple frame.

        Returns:
        the simple frame.

      • setWorldSphere

        public void setWorldSphere(double x,
                  double y,
                  double z,
                  double r)
        Sets the bounding sphere of the frame with a given center x, y, z and radius.
        Parameters:
        x - the center X-coordinate.
        y - the center Y-coordinate.
        z - the center Z-coordinate.
        r - the radius.

      • setWorldSphere

        public void setWorldSphere(double xmin,
                  double ymin,
                  double zmin,
                  double xmax,
                  double ymax,
                  double zmax)
        Sets the bounding sphere of the frame.
        Parameters:
        xmin - the minimum x coordinate.
        ymin - the minimum y coordinate.
        zmin - the minimum z coordinate.
        xmax - the maximum x coordinate.
        ymax - the maximum y coordinate.
        zmax - the maximum z coordinate.

      • setWorldSphere

        Parameters:
        bs - the bounding sphere.

      • paintToFile

        public void paintToFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Paints the view canvas to an image in a file with specified name. Uses the file suffix to determine the format of the image.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file to contain the image.
